text: Gumazim angamra ikɨvɨra ikɨtɨ, amizim gumazir igharazim ko dakuightɨ, eghtɨ me amizir kam mɨkɨm suam, a poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim gamir amizim. Amizir kamɨn pam aremeghtɨ, Moses Osirizir Arazim a ikeghan kogham, eghtɨ a fɨrighrɨgham. Kamaghɨn, a gumazir igharazimɨn ikɨtɨ, me kamaghɨn mɨkɨman kogham, a poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim gami. Puvatɨ.
